miic.core.miic_utils.nd_mat_center_part¶

nd_mat_center_part(ndmat, win_len, axis=0)[source]¶

Extract the “central” part of a matrix.

Extract the “central” part of size win_len from a matrix X along the specified axis. The center is the sample with zero referenced index floor((X.shape[axis]-1)/2). If win_len is an even number the center in the output will similarily be at floor((win_len-1)/2).

Parameters:
  • ndmat (ndarray) – matrix to take the central part
  • win_len (int) – central windows length
  • axis (int) – axis where to act
